lines.text: When one can't use guns, one must work with brains.
In your case, honest sir, such a preference is unavoidable.
You're beautiful. That's easy to say. I know that other people have told you. But what I'm telling you is different, see? For to me you're more than that.
Suppose I don't? Can't you ever get away from the Casbah?
No. I'm caught here, like a bear in a hole. Dogs barking, hunters all around, no way out of it. Do you like that? Maybe it's lucky for you.
I don't like it. And it's not lucky.
You're right. If you don't come back, I might do anything. I might go down to your hotel to get you.
If I can't see Paris when I open my eyes in the morning, I want to go right back to sleep.
I'm sorry, Pepe. He thought you were going to escape.
And so I have, my friend.
Did you ever see a clock that pointed to two and struck four when it is really quarter-past-twelve? Well, your friend Regis is like that. He doesn't ring true.
